welcome.subtitle: JobShaman decodes the reality behind corporate job ads. We calculate actual net income, filter out "fluff" and quantify happiness at work using verified metrics.

value_props.finance_desc: What actually remains after taxes and commute
value_props.bullshit_desc: AI reveals misleading phrases and false claims in job ads
value_props.jhi_desc: 5 dimensions of quality of life in one number

section_why.title: Why JobShaman isn't "just another job board"
section_why.headline: Job offers lie. We know it. You know it too.
section_why.typical_salary_sub: (= how much? Why don't they write it?)
section_why.shaman_tax_sub: We know what's left in your wallet
section_why.shaman_ai_sub: We read between the lines for you
section_why.shaman_benefits_sub: Coffee and fruit isn't a benefit, it's standard

jhi.title: JHI Score - Happiness in Work
jhi.desc: Forget intuition. JHI Score analyzes 5 dimensions of job quality using an algorithm and gives you one number: How much happiness will this job bring?
jhi.footer: Higher salary â‰  better life. JHI shows it.

finance.title: Financial Reality - Truth about money
finance.desc: Companies show gross wage. We calculate net. After taxes. After commute. After everything.

bullshit.title: AI ClichÃ© Analysis
bullshit.desc: AI reads between the lines. You see the truth. Our models are trained to decode HR jargon.
bullshit.anomaly_desc: The dog stays sad at home alone ðŸ˜‚
bullshit.example_1_desc: Detected 847Ã— in our data. 78% of companies with this phrase have turnover >40%.

gap.title: Gap Analysis - What to learn
gap.desc: We don't just want to show you jobs you aren't qualified for. We want to help you get those qualifications. for free if possible.
gap.success_rate: Success: 67% of students get a job within 6 months
gap.step_2: In 3 months: Skill gap closed. Apply with confidence.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: We know what companies hide. Now you know too. We show data ads don't include.
transparency.eu_badge_desc: Mandatory from June 2026. This company plays fair today.

examples.title: Real AI Findings.
examples.subtitle: Not a joke. Real offers decoded into reality.

dog.title: Dog-Friendly Paradox
dog.ai: "While the company offers a dog-friendly office, since you'll be working from your living room, we recommend discussing with your dog whether they agree with your constant presence."

salary.title: Competitive Salary
salary.ai: Translation: "We don't want to say how much = probably low. Avg salary for this position is 28,000 CZK (20% below market)."

team.title: Young Dynamic Team
team.ai: Young = < 25 years. Dynamic = High turnover (60% based on our data). Team = Probably understaffed.
team.score: Warning: âš ï¸âš ï¸âš ï¸âš ï¸

candidates.title: What do you get?
candidates.subtitle: Above standard, that no one else offers. Everything for your career.

companies.title: Publishing misleading job ads? We'll show you what they look like.
companies.desc: Optimize your ads for Gen Z and top talents. Get data candidates actually want to see.
companies.your_ad_content: "Looking for young dynamic person for our team with competitive salary..."

stats.title: Numbers don't speak. They shout.
stats.subtitle: Data from analysis of 50,000+ job offers in 2025/2026.

how_it_works.title: How it works?
how_it_works.subtitle: Simply. Transparently. Fairly.
how_it_works.step_1_desc: {{count}} analyzed positions. JHI score for each. Filter by happiness, salary, location.
how_it_works.step_2_desc: Financial reality (net wage). AI clichÃ© analysis. Transparency (turnover, ghosting).
how_it_works.step_3_desc: Gap analysis (what to learn). AI CV (optimization). AI cover letter (tailored).

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: (and our frequent answers)
faq.a1: Yes. JHI score, Financial reality, Bullshit detector, Gap analysis - all free forever. Premium (199 CZK/month) adds AI CV and cover letters.
faq.a2: We aggregate from jobs.cz, LinkedIn, etc. Analyzed by AI. Anonymized insights.
faq.a3: We evaluate 5 dimensions (Finance, Time, Psyche, Growth, Values) based on 30+ parameters. Result = composite score 0-100.
faq.q4: How does AI detect misleading phrases?
faq.a4: Trained on 50,000+ offers. AI recognizes misleading phrases and red flags with 94% accuracy.
faq.q5: Can I trust the financial calculator?
faq.a5: Yes. We calculate according to current tax rates (2026), including insurance and commute based on location.
faq.q6: What if I find an error?
faq.a6: Report it! Beta testing = we seek feedback. Fixed within 24h.

final_cta.title: Ready to see the truth?
final_cta.desc: Stop wasting time with offers that look good but are bad. JobShaman shows you reality. FREE. Forever.

profile.cv_analyze_ready: CV file is available for analysis
profile.upload_cv_desc: Upload PDF, DOC or DOCX file (max. 10MB) for automatic skills and experience analysis
profile.cv_analysis_desc: Your CV will be automatically processed to extract skills, experience, and education. This data helps us better match your profile with job requirements.
profile.no_experience: You don't have any work experience yet
profile.no_education: You don't have any education yet

seo.base_title: JobShaman - Smart Job Offers in Czechia
seo.home_description: Find your ideal job with AI analysis. JobShaman offers transparent job listings with real salaries, benefits, and JHI scores. Filter by location, perks, and companies.
seo.marketplace_description: Discover courses and retraining for your career. Online training, certifications, and educational programs in Czechia.
seo.profile_description: Manage your profile, saved positions, and preference settings on JobShaman. Personalized job recommendations.
seo.company_dashboard_description: Publish job offers and analyze candidates with AI. JobShaman for companies - modern recruitment with transparency and data.
seo.job_detail_description: Job details for {{title}} at {{company}}. Salary: {{salary}}. Location: {{location}}. Benefits: {{benefits}}.
seo.home_description_simple: AI that reads between the lines.
seo.ai_summary_home: JobShaman is a Czech job search platform with AI analysis. It offers transparent job listings with real salaries, benefits, and a unique JHI score. It allows filtering by location, benefits, and companies.
seo.ai_summary_job: Job details for {{title}} at {{company}}. Offer {{salary}} in location {{location}}. Benefits include: {{benefits}}.
seo.ai_summary_company: JobShaman for companies enables publishing job offers, candidate analysis using AI, and transparent recruitment processes.
seo.ai_summary_default: JobShaman - modern job search platform in Czechia with AI analysis and transparency.

dashboard.title: Recruitment Overview
dashboard.subtitle: Statistics for the whole company and individual recruiters.
dashboard.empty_state_desc: No data yet. Create your first job ad and start hiring.

ai_insights.title: AI Strategic Insights
ai_insights.hired_prediction: Based on history, you'll have a hire within {{days}} days ({{count}} candidates in pipeline). You're on track.
ai_insights.low_match_warning: Low AI match ({{avg}}% avg). We recommend adjusting the work hours description in the job ad.
